::Rust::

Slowly, the pod opens, a bot sitting up and looking around. The bot 
raises uncertainly to his feet. He stood 8 feet tall, and had a large 
array of impressive weapons. A big cannon was attatched to his 
shoulder. He looks around, seeing Whistler.

"You! Identify yourself! What faction are you?" the bot barks, its 
weapon suddenly pointing at Whistler.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Whistler::
>     He is awakened by the crash still.  Still disoriented Whistler 
looks 
> around.  Seeing a fire near by he goes to investigate.  He finds a 
newly 
> crashed stasis pod.  "Curious" he thinks to himself.  "Who are you?"
